main event: Mrs. Cora Bales and her son Clyde Bales reported seeing two unusual bright lights in the sky over Frederick, Oklahoma, on 27 February 1956.
interesting points: The lights appeared round and almost stationary,They had a brilliant bluish-white color,The objects did not blink or move appreciably during the observation,They disappeared suddenly after several minutes of observation,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes.
witness description: Mrs. Cora Bales and her son, Clyde Bales, residents of Frederick, Oklahoma.
